content: Harvard, UNC and UCLA all use the InCommon Federation with Shibboleth, and are down this morning. Are any other installations configured to use Shibboleth in this way, and are you having similar trouble?
Also, because of logs filling up with shibboleth errors Dataverse is down.
any ideas on how to troubleshoot this?
@Don Sizemore Don't know if you saw the UCLA messages. Logs filling up with Shib errors which takes Dataverse down. Any ideas on how to troubleshoot. (thanks in advance)

@Tim Dennis @jamie jamison hello, I apologize, yesterday was a lot. I'll reply to Jamie's latest e-mail in the thread. We'll get this working. Also keep an eye on https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/issues/11404
